forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
